parameters.name: Force
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to forcibly delete the ASM instance. Valid values:

*   `true`: forcibly deletes the ASM instance.
*   `false`: does not forcibly delete the ASM instance.

Default value: false.

parameters.name: RetainResources
parameters.description: A JSON string that can be parsed into a string array. You can use this JSON string to specify the IDs of the resource instances that need to be retained when the ASM instance is deleted.
